item.description: Stearns Square is the host of a free outdoor summer concert series in downtown Springfield on Thursday nights. The showcase band for August 21 is a "Roomful of Blues", one of the most joyful ensembles around. This band belts out tune after tune of hot Jazz, Soul, R & B, Swing, Jump, and Blues music. The appeal of the band are the hot vocals of its lead singer Chris Vochan and the eight piece instrumental band which include saxophones, trumpet, guitar, and drums. This venue is very popular and well attended. It is a guarantee to be a crowd pleaser. Let's Rock...
item.name: Roomful of Blues Concert
